rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with traditional Kerala-style decorative elements.
Main living area that connects to the garden view, incorporating Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Functional modern kitchen with traditional design elements suitable for joint family gatherings.
Dining area located adjacent to the living room to encourage communal meals.
Primary bedroom with a private balcony and natural lighting, designed according to Vastu principles for health.
Connected bathroom adjacent to the primary bedroom, ensuring privacy and ease of access.
Two-car garage designed for easy entry and exit with provisions for storage.
Home theater room with acoustic treatment, integrated into the main floor plan for entertainment purposes.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door ensuring smooth transition between spaces.
Large window offering expansive view of the garden, promoting natural light and Vastu energy flow.
Door connecting living area to kitchen for easy access.
Ventilation window in the kitchen for improved air flow, designed with traditional Kerala style.
Garage door designed to facilitate smooth access from the garage into the house.
Bedroom window ensuring natural light and ventilation, positioned as per Vastu guidelines.
